name: Slime Crossing
description:
A small puzzle game made for Games Made Quick 3

How To Play
- The goal of each level is to put a slime in each of the coloured tiles - The colour of the slime must match the coloured tile - There can be no slimes left over - You can also combine slimes
- If 2 slimes of the same colour combine, it's level goes up - If 2 slimes of the same level combine, they become a level 1 green
- If red or blue combine, the level goes down
- Red or blue absorbing a green will increase level, unless the green is a higher level (then the green will absorb the red/blue and decrease it's level)

Controls
- wasd to move the camera
- left mouse button to select and move slimes
- right click to combine a selected slime with another
